attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Implement in full the recommendations of the Ombudsman over the Equitable Life scandal. The mean spirited plan aired on the 15th.January 09 is totally unacceptable to policyholders defrauded by both Equitable management and this Government's inadequate regulation. Public confidence in private sector pension planning will not be restored until Equitable annuitants are fully compensated.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
